option.lunaslimes.component.title: Luna Slimes Options
tooltip.lunaslimes.wobble_anim: Plays when spawning or splitting/merging with other Slimes.
tooltip.lunaslimes.jump_antic: Slimes will squish in anticipation of a jump.
tooltip.lunaslimes.new_shadows: Scales Slime shadows to match their rendered size.
tooltip.lunaslimes.scale_textures: Bigger Slimes will use higher resolution textures.
tooltip.lunaslimes.glowing_magma: Only the cores and eyes of Magma Cubes will glow.
tooltip.lunaslimes.slime_block_particles: Slimes will use Slime Block particles instead of Slime Ball particles.
tooltip.lunaslimes.merge_sounds: Slimes will play a sound when merging.
tooltip.lunaslimes.split_sounds: Slimes will play a sound when splitting.
tooltip.lunaslimes.max_size:
The highest size a Slime can reach through merging.
Setting to 1 will disable merging.
tooltip.lunaslimes.merge_cooldown:
The time a Slime must wait before merging again.
Values are measured in ticks
tooltip.lunaslimes.on_split_cooldown:
The time a Slime that has been split must wait before being able to merge.
Values are measured in ticks.
tooltip.lunaslimes.split_cooldown:
The time a Slime spawned from splitting must wait until it can merge.
Values are measured in ticks.
tooltip.lunaslimes.spawned_merge_cooldow:
The time a naturally spawned Slime must wait before merging.
Values are measured in ticks.
tooltip.lunaslimes.use_splitting: Slimes will use a new splitting system.
